meta.name: keyword
meta.content: Java Enterpise Ticketing and Box Office

span.style: font-size: 72pt; font-family: Times New Roman; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

span.strong: Management tool for online ticketing and box office, which provides a highly configurable enterprise class solution.
